snippet: A 78-year-old Florida woman tried to fly on an international trip from Detroit Metropolitan Airport with almost $41,000 in cash hidden inside her girdle, bra and carry-on bag, federal authorities said....

headline.print_headline: Woman, 78, Caught With Cash in Girdle at Airport
headline.main: Woman, 78, Caught With Cash in Girdle at Airport

lead_paragraph: A 78-year-old Florida woman tried to fly on an international trip from Detroit Metropolitan Airport with almost $41,000 in cash hidden inside her girdle, bra and carry-on bag, federal authorities said.
